short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add, search, and run prompts in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Store and organize your favorite prompts from various AI platforms. Add, search, and access your prompts with ease. Variables in double curly are automatically detected and can be edited or removed. 

✅ Save time spent rewriting prompts
Cut down on setup time for AI tasks. Get to the results faster with your ready-to-use prompts.

✅ Keep all prompts in one place
Every prompt you create is stored and organized. Access your entire prompt history anytime, from any device.

✅ Reuse prompts across multiple tasks
Spend less time managing prompts and more time creating. Your AI tool of choice becomes a better assistant with organized, reusable prompts.

✅ Turn good prompts into consistent outputs
Use your top-performing prompts on repeat and get predictable, high-quality outputs every time you use AI.

❓  How to use the Chrome Extension: 
1️⃣  Click the "Add to Chrome" button.
2️⃣  Log in to your Promptly account.
3️⃣  Start using Promptly! You can open the Promptly sidebar anytime you need help.
